answers.answer: Are you taking medication for your diabetes? If so, many of these can cause libido problems. So can depression.Talk to your Dr about possible options. If you have a healthy heart Viagra may be an option. There's also the pump. Those are just two things I can think of right now.Don't give up until you've tried everything your Dr recommends.
A friend of mine who is also diabetic has had the pump implanted,he said although recovery from the surgery was painful it was well worth,him and his wife now have a healthy sex life.

question: I am 63, and diabetic. I suffer from chronic depression. I have no libido; Never have had! I will soon be celebrating 18 yrs in an unconsummatedmarriage. Is there any way I can ever hope to have successful intercourse with my wife?
title: sexual health
